Cherrycake\Modules\DatabaseProvider::prepareAndExecute

prepareAndExecute

Performs a full prepared query procedure in just one call. Does the same as if we're executing prepare and execute methods separaterly. Intended for performing prepared queries that won't be repeated in a loop (thus we don't need the benefits of separately preparing the query and then executing it multiple times with different values).

    Signature

    public function prepareAndExecute(string $sql, array $parameters, [boolean $setup = false] )

    Parameters

    $sql — string
    The SQL sentence to prepare to be queried to the database.
    $parameters — array
    Hash array of the variables that must be applied to the prepared query in order to execute the final query, in the same order as are stated on the prepared sql. Same syntax as in the execute method.
    $setup — boolean
    Optional array with additional options, See DatabaseResult::$setup for available options

    Returns

    DatabaseResult
    A provider-specific DatabaseResult object if the query has been executed correctly, false otherwise.
